XIV.6.1.b
.
Responsibility for Ensuring Corrective Action Is Taken
It is not uncommon for records in which identical SSNs appear to fall under the jurisdiction of different ROs.Â  When this occurs, the RO on whose list of duplicate payment cases the records appear is responsible for completing any necessary corrective action.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 6 - Review of Potential Duplicate Payment Cases
